title: SOFA::Question
description: A question message that suggests (or requires) certain answers/actions

question.title: Question
question.description: Plain text message to be shown to recipient

allowCustom.title: Allow Custom
allowCustom.description: Hint for client about whether arbitrary text responses will be parsed. If false, the client should disable the keyboard/input.

response.title: SOFA::Response
response.description: A response that is suggested as an answer to a Question

role.title: Role
role.description: Hint to client about the meaning of the response, for UI/rendering
